description:
And I mean bitch in the most loving fashion... Berlin is back & man does she show us what shes made of. The hard ties just get harder and the easy ties just fool her into thinking I am a softy.
Berlin is back and put through some "Category 5" ties which give her NO room for comfort. Though her mouth begs for me to stop, her clit begs for me to continue. As each suspension starts to wind down and she starts to "see the light at the end of the tunnel" I crank up the volume & her orgasms just keep on coming.
This is one update to go into the history books of discomfort, pain, begging & screaming orgasms.... Welcome back Berlin!
title: Berlin: The EXTREME Bitch is back!
